name: Spinlogic Technologies
overview: Spinlogic Technologies, Inc. provides a suite of software that enables trading partners to exchange business documents electronically. It develops and commercializes a software suite designed to optimize organizationsâ€™ logistic chain, from manufacturers to distributors and retailers. The company’s products include Negotium, a client-side software that enables the processing of various documents and business procedures in conformity with retailersâ€™ requirements; and the PEG-SERVR platform, which is an integrated transaction server that allows the exchange of a range of electronic documents between business partners. Spinlogic Technologies also offers PEG-Insourced, a solution that eliminates the risks associated with upgrading the current electronic data interchange (EDI) software or outsourcing the EDI system. PEG-Insourced includes hardware, software, system integration, project management, as well as technical support. The company offers its products to enterprises within the healthcare/biomedical, food and beverage, hardware/home improvement, electronics, apparel, and manufacturing/industrial sectors. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Montreal, Canada.
